audits.notes: Fixed: double-close panic, unbounded goroutines, size validation, context cancellation
Fixed: PID file race condition (remove after stop), D-state tracking for hung USB detection
All 5 AI findings were false positives after manual verification

FINAL AUDIT: Fixed 2 real bugs: (1) BusMonitor statement race - added isClosed() check before statement access, (2) PID file path inconsistency - stored path at acquisition for consistent removal. Code is now SHIP READY.
